title: Trump retweets call to fire Anthony Fauci after the coronavirus expert says quicker response ‘could have saved lives’ - The Washington Post

content: Fauci, known for his candor but also his diplomacy, has implicitly and explicitly taken issue with Trump on several occasions. Trump demonstrated his apparently increasing irritation last week when he stepped in to stop Fauci from answering a question about t… [+3848 chars]
